00003 struct VideoStreamingParams //EDIT: Not secure for multiple instances. Move to private section of the class
00004 {
00005         bool isprepared;
00006         AVFrame *srcframe, *destframe;
00007         uint8_t *srcbuffer, *destbuffer;

00019 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 // Name: Load()
00021 // Desc: Load audio or video file, extract streams and load codecs
00022 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 Result MediaFile::Load(FilePath path)
00024 {
00025         // Close old file
00026         Close();
00027 
00028         // Open file
00029         if(av_open_input_file(&formatctx, path, NULL, 0, NULL))
00030                 return ERR(String("Error opening file") << path);
00031 
00032         // Retrieve stream information
00033         if(av_find_stream_info(formatctx) < 0)
00034                 ERR("Stream information not found");
00035 
00036         // Get streams and load decoders
00037         Stream *newstream, ***streams;
00038         UINT *numstreams;
00039         CHKALLOC(streamidxmap = new UINT[formatctx->nb_streams]);
00040         for(UINT i = 0; i < formatctx->nb_streams; i++)
00041         {
00042                 switch(formatctx->streams[i]->codec->codec_type)
00043                 {
00044                 case CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO:
00045                         streams = &videostreams;
00046                         numstreams = &numvideostreams;
00047                         break;
00048 
00049                 case CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO:
00050                         streams = &audiostreams;
00051                         numstreams = &numaudiostreams;
00052                         break;
00053 
00054                 default:
00055                         streams = NULL;
00056                 }
00057                 if(!streams)
00058                         continue;
00059 
00060                 CHKALLOC(newstream = new Stream());
00061                 newstream->absolutestreamidx = i;
00062 
00063                 // Get codec context
00064                 newstream->codecctx = formatctx->streams[i]->codec;
00065 
00066                 // Find codec
00067                 newstream->encoder = NULL;
00068                 newstream->decoder = avcodec_find_decoder(newstream->codecctx->codec_id);
00069 
00070                 // Report missing codec
00071                 if(!newstream->decoder)
00072                 {
00073                         char buf[256];
00074                         avcodec_string(buf, 256, newstream->codecctx, 0);
00075                         return ERR(String("Codec not found for ") << String(buf)); //EDIT: Just report, don't fail
00076                 }
00077 
00078                 // Allow truncated bitstreams
00079                 if(newstream->decoder->capabilities & CODEC_CAP_TRUNCATED)
00080                         newstream->codecctx->flags |= CODEC_FLAG_TRUNCATED;
00081 
00082                 // Open codec
00083                 if(avcodec_open(newstream->codecctx, newstream->decoder) < 0)
00084                         return ERR("Error opening codec");
00085 
00086                 CHKALLOC(*streams = (Stream**)realloc(*streams, (*numstreams + 1) * sizeof(Stream*)));
00087                 (*streams)[*numstreams] = newstream;
00088                 streamidxmap[i] = (*numstreams)++;
00089         }
00090 
00091         // Initialize streaming parameters
00092         vsparams = new VideoStreamingParams[numvideostreams];
00093 
00094         return R_OK;
00095 }
00096 
00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 // Name: Close()
00099 // Desc: Close file
00100 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 void MediaFile::Close()
00102 {
00103         UINT i;
00104 
00105         // Close video codecs and remove video streams
00106         for(i = 0; i < numvideostreams; i++)
00107         {
00108                 avcodec_close(videostreams[i]->codecctx);
00109                 REMOVE(videostreams[i])
00110         }
00111         REMOVE_ARRAY(videostreams)
00112         numvideostreams = 0;
00113 
00114         // Close audio codecs and remove audio streams
00115         for(i = 0; i < numaudiostreams; i++)
00116         {
00117                 avcodec_close(audiostreams[i]->codecctx);
00118                 REMOVE(audiostreams[i])
00119         }
00120         REMOVE_ARRAY(audiostreams)
00121         numaudiostreams = 0;
00122 
00123         // Close video file
00124         if(formatctx)
00125         {
00126                 av_close_input_file(formatctx);
00127                 formatctx = NULL;
00128         }
00129 
00130         // Remove stream index map
00131         REMOVE_ARRAY(streamidxmap)
00132 
00133         // Remove streaming parameters
00134         for(i = 0; i < numvideostreams; i++)
00135                 EndVideoStreaming(i);
00136         REMOVE_ARRAY(vsparams)
00137 }

00139 #pragma region Video Streaming
00140 Result AllocPicture(int width, int height, PixelFormat pixfmt, uint8_t **buffer, AVFrame** picture)
00141 {
00142         int bufferlength;
00143 
00144         CHKALLOC(*picture = avcodec_alloc_frame());
00145 
00146         bufferlength = avpicture_get_size(pixfmt, width, height);
00147         *buffer = (uint8_t*)av_malloc(bufferlength);
00148         if(!*buffer)
00149         {
00150                 AVREMOVE(picture)
00151                 return ERR(E_OUTOFMEMORY);
00152         }
00153 
00154         avpicture_fill((AVPicture*)*picture, *buffer, pixfmt, width, height);
00155 
00156         return R_OK;
00157 }

00159 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 // Name: PrepareVideoStreaming()
00161 // Desc: Allocate memory for video streaming and setup video transformations
00162 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 Result MediaFile::PrepareVideoStreaming(UINT streamidx, const Size<int>* destsize, const PixelFormat* destpixfmt,
00164                                                                                                 int swscontextflags, uint8_t** framedata)
00165 {
00166         *framedata = NULL;
00167 
00168         if(streamidx >= numvideostreams)
00169                 return ERR("Invalid stream index");
00170         if(videostreams[streamidx]->decoder == NULL)
00171                 return ERR("Trying to decode stream with no codec loaded");
00172 
00173         AVCodecContext* codecctx = videostreams[streamidx]->codecctx;
00174         VideoStreamingParams* params = &vsparams[streamidx];
00175         Result rlt;
00176 
00177         // Set video sizes
00178         params->srcsize.width = codecctx->width;
00179         params->srcsize.height = codecctx->height;
00180         if(destsize)
00181                 params->destsize = Size<int>(*destsize);
00182         else
00183                 params->destsize = params->srcsize;
00184 
00185         // Set pixel formats
00186         params->srcpixfmt = codecctx->pix_fmt;
00187         if(destpixfmt)
00188                 params->destpixfmt = *destpixfmt;
00189         else
00190                 params->destpixfmt = params->srcpixfmt;
00191 
00192         if(params->srcsize != params->destsize || params->srcpixfmt != params->destpixfmt)
00193         {
00194                 // Allocate memory
00195                 CHKRESULT(AllocPicture(params->srcsize.width, params->srcsize.height, params->srcpixfmt, &params->srcbuffer, &params->srcframe));
00196                 CHKRESULT(AllocPicture(params->destsize.width, params->destsize.height, params->destpixfmt, &params->destbuffer, &params->destframe));
00197                 *framedata = params->destbuffer;
00198 
00199                 // Prepare video transformations
00200                 params->convertctx = sws_getContext(params->srcsize.width, params->srcsize.height, params->srcpixfmt,
00201                                                                                         params->destsize.width, params->destsize.height, params->destpixfmt, swscontextflags, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00202         }
00203         else
00204         {
00205                 // Allocate memory
00206                 CHKRESULT(AllocPicture(params->srcsize.width, params->srcsize.height, params->srcpixfmt, &params->srcbuffer, &params->srcframe));
00207                 *framedata = params->srcbuffer;
00208 
00209                 // Video transformations, destination frame and destination buffer aren't needed
00210                 params->destbuffer = NULL;
00211                 params->destframe = NULL;
00212                 params->convertctx = NULL;
00213         }
00214 
00215         params->isprepared = true;
00216 
00217         return R_OK;
00218 }

00220 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00221 // Name: StreamContent()
00222 // Desc: Decode audio and video streams and return the new frame
00223 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00224 Result MediaFile::StreamContent(float dt, bool *finished)
00225 {
00226         VideoStreamingParams* videoparams;
00227         int readresult, framefinished;
00228         static AVPacket packet;
00229         UINT streamidx;
00230 
00231         *finished = false;
00232 
00233         while((readresult = av_read_frame(formatctx, &packet)) >= 0)
00234         {
00235                 switch(formatctx->streams[packet.stream_index]->codec->codec_type)
00236                 {
00237                 case CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO:
00238                         if(vsparams[streamidxmap[packet.stream_index]].isprepared)
00239                         {
00240                                 streamidx = streamidxmap[packet.stream_index]; // Get video stream index from absolute stream index
00241                                 videoparams = &vsparams[streamidx];
00242 
00243                                 // Store frame index
00244                                 videoparams->frameidx = packet.pts;
00245 
00246                                 // Decode video frame
00247                                 avcodec_decode_video(videostreams[streamidx]->codecctx, videoparams->srcframe, &framefinished, packet.data, packet.size); //EDIT: Function is deprecated
00248 
00249                                 // Apply transformation
00250                                 if(videoparams->convertctx)
00251                                         sws_scale(videoparams->convertctx, videoparams->srcframe->data, videoparams->srcframe->linesize, 0,
00252                                                           videostreams[streamidx]->codecctx->height, videoparams->destframe->data, videoparams->destframe->linesize);
00253 
00254                                 if(framefinished) //EDIT: Wait for framefinished of other streams
00255                                         return R_OK;
00256                         }
00257                         break;
00258 
00259                 case CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO:
00260                         break;
00261                 }
00262         }
00263 
00264         if(readresult != -32) // -32 ... Return code for finished streaming
00265                 return ERR("Error reading frame");
00266 
00267         //if(params->repeat) //EDIT: Set repeat globally
00268         //{
00269         //      av_seek_frame(formatctx, videostreams[streamidx]->absolutestreamidx, 0, AVSEEK_FLAG_FRAME);
00270         //      av_free_packet(&packet); // EDIT: not jet working (also freeing and recreating this non-pointer value seems wrong)
00271         //      av_init_packet(&packet); // EDIT: not jet working (also freeing and recreating this non-pointer value seems wrong)
00272         //      packet.data = (uint8_t*)"FLUSH"; // EDIT: not jet working (also freeing and recreating this non-pointer value seems wrong)
00273         //}
00274         //else
00275                 *finished = true;
00276 
00277         return R_OK;
00278 }

00280 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00281 // Name: EndVideoStreaming()
00282 // Desc: Free memory
00283 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00284 void MediaFile::EndVideoStreaming(UINT streamidx)
00285 {
00286         if(streamidx >= numvideostreams || !vsparams[streamidx].isprepared)
00287                 return;
00288 
00289         VideoStreamingParams* params = &vsparams[streamidx];
00290 
00291         // Remove buffers
00292         AVREMOVE(params->srcbuffer)
00293         AVREMOVE(params->destbuffer)
00294 
00295         // Remove frames
00296         AVREMOVE(params->srcframe)
00297         AVREMOVE(params->destframe)
00298 
00299         // Remove video transformations
00300         if(params->convertctx)
00301         {
00302                 sws_freeContext(params->convertctx);
00303                 params->convertctx = NULL;
00304         }
00305 
00306         params->isprepared = false;
00307 }

00310 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00311 // Name: GetVideoWidth()
00312 // Desc: Get video frame width
00313 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00314 int MediaFile::GetVideoWidth(UINT streamindex)
00315 {
00316         return streamindex < numvideostreams ? videostreams[streamindex]->codecctx->width : 0;
00317 }

00320 // Name: GetVideoHeight()
00321 // Desc: Get video frame height
00322 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00323 int MediaFile::GetVideoHeight(UINT streamindex)
00324 {
00325         return streamindex < numvideostreams ? videostreams[streamindex]->codecctx->height : 0;

00328 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00329 // Name: GetVideoFrame()
00330 // Desc: Get current video frame index
00331 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00332 LONGLONG MediaFile::GetVideoFrame(UINT streamindex)
00333 {
00334         return streamindex < numvideostreams && vsparams[streamindex].isprepared ? vsparams[streamindex].frameidx : 0;
00335 }
00336 
00337 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00338 // Name: SetVideoFrame()
00339 // Desc: Seek to the given frame
00340 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00341 void MediaFile::SetVideoFrame(UINT streamindex, LONGLONG frame)
00342 {
00343         if(streamindex >= numvideostreams || !vsparams[streamindex].isprepared)
00344                 return;
00345 
00346         vsparams[streamindex].frameidx = frame;
00347         av_seek_frame(formatctx, videostreams[streamindex]->absolutestreamidx, frame, AVSEEK_FLAG_FRAME);
00348 }

00354 void MediaFile::Release()
